short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power tools for power users. v1.0.6 - Updated subscriptions code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This productivity extension includes functionality that allows users to add additional features to the product. It comes with a few tools like search, bulk update, custom data syncs, and a back up feature.

Users can also utilize it to quickly add worksheets and make formula changes across commission plans.

This extension uses the user's email to provide service and does not share any personal information with other parties. For additional information, please visit https://extension.captivateiq.open-spm.com/privacy-policy
